data.name: DrawPage
desc: This is the service provided by a com.sun.star.drawing.DrawPage inside a PresentationDocument.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: Change
desc: specifies how the page change is triggered.

If this is 0, the user must click to start each object animation and to change the page. If set to 1, the page is automatically switched. If it is set to 2, all object effects run automatically, but the user has to click on the page to change it.

properties.name: DateTimeFormat
desc: defines the format that is used to format a date and time text field on this page.
This is only used if IsDateTimeFixed is FALSE.

properties.name: DateTimeText
desc: defines the text that is displayed in a date and time textfield rendered on this page.
This value is only used if IsDateTimeFixed is TRUE.

properties.name: Duration
desc: If the property com.sun.star.drawing.DrawPage.Change is set to 1, this is the time in seconds this page is shown before switching to the next page.

properties.name: Effect
desc: This is the effect that is used to fade in this page.

properties.name: FooterText
desc: defines the text that is displayed in a footer textfield rendered on this page.

properties.name: HeaderText
desc: defines the text that is displayed in a header textfield rendered on this page.

properties.name: HighResDuration
desc: If the property com.sun.star.drawing.DrawPage.Change is set to 1, this is the time in seconds this page is shown before switching to the next page, also permitting sub-second precision here.

properties.name: IsDateTimeFixed
desc: defines if a date and time text field shows a fixed string value or the current date on this page.

properties.name: IsDateTimeVisible
desc: defines if a date and time presentation shape from the master page is visible on this page.

properties.name: IsFooterVisible
desc: defines if a footer presentation shape from the master page is visible on this page.

properties.name: IsHeaderVisible
desc: defines if a header presentation shape from the master page is visible on this page.

properties.name: IsPageNumberVisible
desc: defines if a page number presentation shape from the master page is visible on this page.

properties.name: Layout
desc: If this property is not ZERO, this number specifies a presentation layout for this page.

properties.name: Speed
desc: Defines the speed of the fade-in effect of this page.

properties.name: TransitionDuration
desc: Specifies slide transition time in seconds.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1
